metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2663 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description: In Xpdf 4.04 (and earlier), a PDF object loop in the page label tree leads to infinite recursion and a stack overflow.

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
